content:
Sure, I can make the story even shorter, similar to the style of "On the First Day of Kindergarten" by Tish Rabe. Here is a shorter version of the story:

Meicha starts kindergarten.
She makes new friends.
She learns and plays.
She loves her school.

This version is even shorter, it can be made with 4-6 pages. With simple illustrations, it will be easy for the child to follow and understand the story, and it will be easy for the parent/teacher to read it out loud. The storybook is also easy to carry and read anywhere.
